node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `pollvote` ( `pollvote_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `voter_user` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `choice` tinyint(4) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `votetime` datetime NOT NULL DEFAULT '0000-00-00 00:00:00', PRIMARY KEY (`pollvote_id`,`voter_user`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: pollvote
